summary: This document appears to be a financial statement from Deutsche Asset & Wealth Management detailing account activity for Southern Financial LLC for the period of December 1, 2015, to December 31, 2015. It includes information on account values, cash deposits and withdrawals, asset allocation, and portfolio holdings. This document contains financial information related to portfolio holdings, transactions, and realized gains and losses for a specified period. It includes details about various securities, their market values, and transactions involving cash withdrawals and deposits. The document is marked confidential and is part of a larger set of records related to the Epstein case. This document appears to be a financial statement from Deutsche Asset & Wealth Management detailing account information, bond market values, and important disclosures regarding transactions and account management. It includes various financial terms and conditions related to the management of securities and accounts, as well as information about the role of Pershing LLC as a clearing broker. This document contains a financial statement from Deutsche Asset & Wealth Management detailing account activities, asset allocations, and portfolio holdings for a specific period. It includes information on cash deposits, withdrawals, securities, and income generated from investments. This document contains financial information related to Deutsche Asset & Wealth Management, detailing portfolio holdings, realized gains and losses, and transactions for a specified period. It includes various securities, their market values, and associated financial metrics, as well as notes on cost basis reporting rules. This document appears to be a financial statement detailing account information, including bond market values, investment allocations, and transactions for a specific period. It includes disclosures about the roles of financial institutions and the nature of various securities held in the account. This document contains detailed portfolio holdings from Deutsche Asset & Wealth Management, including various fixed income securities, equities, and their respective market values, costs, and yields. It outlines the financial performance of these assets over a specified statement period, highlighting unrealized gains and losses. This document appears to be a financial statement detailing realized gains and losses, transactions, and account information for a specific period. It includes information about securities, dividends, interest, and cash transactions, along with disclaimers regarding tax reporting and investment advice. This document appears to be a financial statement from Pershing LLC detailing account activities for Southern Financial LLC for the period of September 1, 2015, to September 30, 2015. It includes information on account balances, transactions, asset allocations, and income summaries, highlighting significant financial activities and holdings. This document contains detailed portfolio holdings and financial information related to Deutsche Asset & Wealth Management, including various equities, their acquisition dates, costs, and market values. It outlines the performance of different stocks and provides insights into the financial status of the accounts managed by the firm. This document appears to be a financial statement detailing account activities, including credits, debits, and transactions related to securities, dividends, and cash withdrawals. It includes specific figures for various financial activities over a specified period, highlighting significant cash movements and investment income. This document appears to be a financial statement from Pershing LLC detailing account activities, asset allocations, and investment performance for Southern Financial LLC. It includes disclosures about the roles of Pershing as a clearing broker and the responsibilities of the financial institution managing the account. This document contains detailed portfolio holdings and financial transactions related to various securities, including corporate bonds, equities, and preferred stocks. It outlines the acquisition dates, quantities, unit costs, market values, and unrealized gains or losses for each security, providing insights into the financial status of the portfolio during the specified period. This document contains a financial statement detailing transactions, account balances, and asset allocations for an account managed by Deutsche Asset & Wealth Management. It includes information on securities bought and sold, cash withdrawals, dividends, and interest received over a specified period. This document contains a detailed account statement from Deutsche Asset & Wealth Management, outlining various portfolio holdings, including equities, fixed income securities, and their respective market values, costs, and yields. It provides insights into the financial activities and investments associated with the account during the specified period. This document contains a detailed schedule of realized gains and losses for various securities transactions conducted between July 1, 2015, and July 31, 2015. It outlines the acquisition and disposition of securities, including costs, proceeds, and realized gains or losses, as well as information on cash withdrawals and deposits. The document emphasizes the importance of accurate tax reporting and the responsibilities of the account holder. This document appears to be a financial statement detailing account activities, including trades, cash deposits, and withdrawals for a specific period. It includes information about bond quality, market values, and various financial disclosures related to investment accounts managed by Deutsche Asset & Wealth Management. This document contains detailed portfolio holdings from Deutsche Asset & Wealth Management, including various fixed income securities, corporate bonds, and equities. It outlines the acquisition dates, quantities, unit costs, and market values of the assets, along with unrealized gains and losses. The document is significant for understanding the financial dealings and asset management related to the Epstein case. This document contains a detailed schedule of realized gains and losses for various securities transactions, including purchases, sales, dividends, and interest received. This document appears to be a financial statement detailing trades, account information, and disclosures related to securities transactions. It includes information about trades not settled, client service information, and various disclosures regarding the role of Pershing as a clearing broker. The document emphasizes the importance of accurate reporting and the responsibilities of both the client and the financial institution. This document contains detailed financial information related to asset allocation, gains and losses, and portfolio holdings for Deutsche Asset & Wealth Management. It outlines the roles and responsibilities of Pershing as a clearing broker, details about margin accounts, tax information, and arbitration agreements. The document emphasizes the importance of accurate reporting and the limitations of liability for Pershing. This document contains a detailed financial statement from Deutsche Asset & Wealth Management for the account of Southern Financial LLC, covering the period from February 1, 2015, to December 25, 2015. It includes information on account values, cash deposits, withdrawals, asset allocations, and portfolio holdings, highlighting significant financial activities and changes in asset values during the specified period.
